summary:
sexy transparent female vests in white, black, green and pink textile and black latex.
craftable clothing and craftable and upgradeable Light Armor standalone
various meshes +/- (T)BBP available
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53864-1-1400258600.jpg[/img]
[color=#93c47d]thx to jynxii (pvc), Baldorius (white) and nautiluse (pink) for the images[/color]

[color=yellow][b]This adds 5 variations of semi-transparent vests (undershirt / tank top - US)
- light armor can be crafted at the forge (under hide) and upgraded at the workbench
- clothing versions are craftable at the tanning rack

[color=#00ff00]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[u][size=4]Requirements[/size][/u]
compatible (T)BBP skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton[/url]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/b][/color]

[color=#a4c2f4][b]***[/b] many thanx to those who have done conversions - please show your appreciation and give them kudos [b]***[/b][/color]
UNPB BBP [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5755831/?]jynxii[/url]

============================================================================================

v.4.01
- green and black textile added
- all body meshes now main files and include both clothing and light armor
- some tweaks to color / transparency
- CBBE TBBP added (+optional bodyslide files)
- CHSBHC added

v3.01
- pink variant added
- craftable clothing version esp
- both clothing and light armor esp
- UNPB w/ BBP meshes
- Sevenbase Bombshell standard and B-cup variant meshes
- Dreamgirl with BBP meshes
- DG more modified (slightly bigger breasts and thighs) versions added
- DG TBBP added
- UNPB fixed some clipping
- DG BBP / TBBP fixed wrist / ankle gap

v2.01
- black pvc version added
- slight increase to armor rating on both
- white vest slightly less bright and slightly more transparent
